text:
[trapit-site-2014/] 16 new commits:
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/cb04dd2bdf213a14b95e1685a286bd4951232b1f|cb04dd2bdf21>: Vertically aligned nav and logo.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/6ea9d9fbe6a9a9a39abd5679462593c4421d3558|6ea9d9fbe6a9>: Preventing nav from breaking before it goes to mobile layout.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/c274f4348a79339ea2eaacffb8c701715cbf392d|c274f4348a79>: Removed underline from tab hover.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/99e66aa135e01f0992bf2f5dc49fd94a274c965e|99e66aa135e0>: Centered tab loading spinner.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/818fcd9ad1389685efbcffe39694c618e8ed5f26|818fcd9ad138>: Added more content button to home page.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/93a921fa97ab4346331ac212f930eac3999eb499|93a921fa97ab>: More content button responsive updates.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/d0d191f50904c097e8e000c44e438ffc165b7afe|d0d191f50904>: Tabs>source name color change.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/8d6ebeab25f41cc2de286c18c383809f63153100|8d6ebeab25f4>: Fixed nav selected line position.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/d841e94d455ce03c10a7d44ce72201b26761e29e|d841e94d455c>: Wired up traps' social links and making them open on a popup window.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/67398e428fd1d8de7b6f51b27f84ce499068c27c|67398e428fd1>: Moved HIW icons a few pixels down.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/1fa33b8137045614d7996e351ae1f519b8fc3f61|1fa33b813704>: Increased vertical spacing on HIW sections.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/0148e5b065aa5273e4d55d2b1eec3745d0c50fdf|0148e5b065aa>: Vertically realigned watch video button.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/5fb261fae61ce8a3e57f6e4d28c639cb81e1d789|5fb261fae61c>: Moved lead text on resources page.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/21c0acd9bf5d7c2ed33499ea1b16ee0779c82e71|21c0acd9bf5d>: Adjusted white paper block type.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/1011e007fc156c970030dd201d849322af0356d7|1011e007fc15>: Moved award icons to the HIW page.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/5dc0827da79dbf72585019447d4c55c00de94635|5dc0827da79d>: Underlining links across the site as appropriate.
 - gastonfig

[trapit-site-2014/master] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/f5495114e60d1c321366759c1243ca253d616cd1|f5495114e60d>: Added masonry layout to WPAS.
 - gastonfig
Leaving home a little late but now we have masonry on WPAS :sunglasses: . See you at the office.
:thumbsup:
so - question re: Dev site. Looking at the trapit in action materials, does our previous discussion prevent us from showing any of the summary text for articles showing up?
looks like it shows up on rollover, but not until
That's right.
We're only seeing the descriptions for the ones where Karen added the "more" line.
That's why the desc is missing on a lot of them.
<@U0265G76F>: you're talking about the actual trap feed though, right?
not the blog
right
the ‘trapit’ content on the homepage
Right. So <@U02618EV1> the "only show the title, get rid of the hover" thing should apply *only* to blog content
with trap content remaining as-is
Yes, that's correct.
ok sounds good
A file was shared
I think that's the intended end result. Please correct me if I'm wrong <@U0260V1BX>.
true but a) it seems like the titles are not getting pulled in correctly, and b) the tiles are about 50px taller than they should be
ah - that’s it. Titles are not pulling in
looks like the source name is getting pulled in as titles
right
<@U02618EV1> there are also some places where the image is a little shorter— i am assuming thats because those images have a wider aspect ratio
Oh, yes, pulling titles from the wrong place.
is there any way to make everything fit into that same image area - by cropping into the sides?
Yes, but will need to change the layout structure
So we should probably prioritize it against the other items on our to-do list.
I would say it's not super-high priority. Getting the titles right is :grinning:
how long do you think it would take?
I just fixed the titles (pushing soon). The image fill will be a few hours. We are using the same code across the site so this will need to be changed and tested on a few pages besides home.

[trapit-site-2014/] 2 new commits:
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/f62e117827dc62c615a70c399b5044b48cee03ce|f62e117827dc>: Adding the correct title to trap blocks.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/89366c8f8cba93490923c97414765e536d9fad48|89366c8f8cba>: Made trap content blocks shorter.
 - gastonfig
<@U0260V1BX> I just pushed the fixed title and the and made the tiles shorter.
Don't know if that the expected result. Can you take a look?
it is. although i see that now some of the social media icons are getting cut off. do we have a character limit on the summary text?
trying to figure out how to strike a balance between having it not look too spacious for short titles, and having everything fit with long titles/summaries
Yes, its's 182
for the title, right?
but what about the summary text?
That's for the summary
I didn't have a limit for the titles but we can add one
no its ok. hold on a sec
ok, well i guess we need to undo the tile shortening  then. I would like to accommodate for 3 line titles.
Sure thing

[trapit-site-2014/] 2 new commits:
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/a85d8ea4047b281d5d4b6032601a649838aefbaf|a85d8ea4047b>: Fixed WPAS lead text overflowing on mobile.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/e37d23792764a2cc648c3914ccd756e4e026072e|e37d23792764>: Reverted back to previous trap block height.
 - gastonfig
<@U0260V1BX> can remember what we agreed on this morning. For the HS blog landing page, are we just removing the hover effect and the post date date?
we are removing the hover effect and the request from david was to add in the post date,
i can comp up how the date should look
Awesome. Thanks.
A detail I forgot this morning about the blog is that we still need to draw the "more" line on new posts.
Only because we still need the summary for the latest post. <http://trap.hs-sites.com/blog>
ahh
gaston let's chat
i'll come find ya when you're ready
The good news is that's something we need to do on the latest post so we don't have to update legacy ones.
<@U026AP8CM> I'm free now

Sorry to keep bringing things up but I noticed that older posts (after the 11th row <http://trap.hs-sites.com/blog/all>) don't have a featured image. We should probably create a Trello task to add them to each post.
Happy to help here on any way I can.
it looks like they do have images but theyre showing up on hover
That's right. We just need to select that image as a featured one within HS's post editor.
Happy to get that started
thanks <@U026AP8CM>
I'm going through & deleting those lines right now, I can put together a list of picture-less blog posts
<@U02618EV1> <@U0289USNA> : it looks like the logos are being sized up on What People Are Saying (in the same way it was happening on the homepage before)
see the SGI logo on home and WPAS.
Do you know how big the SGI image should be?
the homepage is displaying it correctly
Checking...
Ok, the testimonials asset is 2x larger than the one on the homepage
At the same resolution.
i uploaded the same asset in both places though
Sounds like a CMS thing
its weird though, because some of them look fine
i'll make a trello card for it
thanks melissa
What would be the desired max-width and max-height for assets in that section?
max is 320x140 retina
so larger images will scale down appropriately
but i have also been uploading smaller images and those should not get scaled up
OK.
